entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:00 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
